item.pokecube.beastcube.desc: A modified pokécube that increases chance in other dimensions.
item.pokecube.clonecube.desc: A modified pokécube by a mysterious pokemon. Increase capture of Ghost/Psychic types
item.pokecube.teammagmacube.desc: A modified pokécube that increases the capture of Fire types.
item.pokecube.teamaquacube.desc: A modified pokécube that increases the capture of Ice types.
item.pokecube.typingcube.desc: A modified pokécube that increases the capture of Ground types.
item.pokecube.rocketcube.desc: A modified pokécube used by Team Rocket.
msg.infolegend.info: §aCapture [%1$s§a] Type Pokemob so he can Trust You. Needs: %2$s, §aOwn: %3$s.
msg.infolegendduo.info: §aCapture [%1$s§a] Type Pokemob and Kill [%2$s§a] Type Pokemob. Needs: %3$s, §aOwn: %4$s. §aNeeds Kill: %5$s, §aOwn: %6$s.
msg.nohere.info: §c[§a%1$s§c] does not seem to spawn in this location.
msg.notrust.info: §c[§a%1$s§c] does not trust you enough for that.
msg.notaraidspot.info: §cThis den does not seem to be able to be activated.
